roleset.name: to make small adjustments
roleset.note: FINETUNE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'finetune' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from finetune.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: gerund
example.text: After the study , [the SEC]-1 would be willing [*-1]-2 to consider [*-2] adding new circuit breakers or fine-tuning the current ones , he added [0] [*T*-3] .
